name: Montezuma Loops Blitz 2
description:
"Maybe the best ZUMA style game ever on iPad&iPhone and it's FREE!!"
"I love this game and am addicted to it"
"Once you start playing you can't stop. Great game!!"


The highly popular and addictive ball game(Zuma or Luxor style) for iPad&iPhone has come to the App Store FOR FREE!!


Game Features:

1. Fully designed for iPad&iPhone.

2. An exciting, replayable, fun Blitz mode.

3. Dozens of exciting levels offering you an unforgettable gaming experience.

4. Up to 12 powerful power-ups to upgrade.

5. One touch game control, simple and intuitive.

6. Beautiful eye-catching and awesome display graphics.

7. Appealing music and excellent sound.

8. Beat your Game Center friends with higher score.


More In The Future:

1. Many more levels will be released regularly in future updates.

2. More powerful power-ups.

3. And much more!!


Last, a big THANK YOU goes out to everyone who has played this game! THANK YOU!
